Hello, I am looking for someone who would privately review/test my game "History Quest".

A sci-fi game set around exploring ruins of lost civilizations, recovering artifacts and selling them.
The game will aim for sandbox like enviroment.

I would like to use Skype as way of communication.
My skype: sebastian.strycek

In a case that you wish to communicate with me in a different manner contact me at:
sebastianstrycek@gmail.com

Posts.EditableText:
By the time, I suppose you already got a tester and the game was released, right? 

However if you need, I can test any game you design.
